channel.title: Delivery on Chief Design Officer at buzzvil
channel.description: Recent content in Delivery on Chief Design Officer at buzzvil

item.title: Product Manager @buzzvil
item.description: From January 2021, I took on a product Manager role for our supply business. I led a cross-functional team of 10 members and I was in charge of the performance of our supply products interfaces (for App/Web Publishers) until March 2022.
